question: Which of the following is the first state to launch the online RTI platform?
explanation: Maharashtra become the first state to enable people to seek information online rocess of filing Right To Information (RTI) applications under the Act. Presently, people file their RTI applications physically and pay a fee of Rs10 via modes like a court fee stamp, demand draft and Indian postal order. The system of filing RTI applications online will help simplify the process.
